instructions for installing SfePy onto Windows

This page contains instructions for installing SfePy onto Windows.


*Step by step Instructions:*

1. Minimum 4 Gigabytes of free disk space, Due to the installed size of python(x,y) and msysgit.

2. Download the latest *python(x,y) (http://www.pythonxy.com/)* windows installer, and make a *Full installation* in the default installation directory.

3. Download the latest *pyparsing (http://sourceforge.net/projects/pyparsing)* windows installer (Python version 2.6) and install it in the default installation directory.

4. Download the latest *mysysgit (http://code.google.com/p/msysgit/)* windows installer (get the file that begins with "msysGit-fullinstall") and install it in the default installation directory.

5. Download the latest *umfpackpy (http://code.google.com/p/umfpackpy/)* zip
a) Download and Extract the *scikits.umfpack-5.1.0-py2.6-win32.zip* to your convenient location on Hard disk, Lets assume it's extracted on C:/. Now there will be two files on the extracted folder, *ez_setup.py* and *scikits.umfpack-5.1.0-py2.6-win32.egg*.

b) Start msys and write the following code to go to the extracted folder.

*$ cd /c/scikits.umfpack-5.1.0-py2.6-win32/*

c) Write the following code on msys to install the UMFPACK library for python.

*$ ez_setup.py scikits.umfpack-5.1.0-py2.6-win32.egg*
